name: DRUNNER
description:
DRUNNER is a short game about running fast.

This is my very first project in unity & I've basically had not much experience before. Expect bugs when the prototype is released, most stuff is polished for now.

DRUNNER PLANS:

-Enemies

-More collectables

-Powerups / Abilities

-6 Worlds

-Par Times

-Key Bindings

I hope you enjoy DRUNNER as much as I have making it.

Please read the most recent devlog before playing DRUNNER.

Drunner github repository here!
